author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COMPACT BUT POWERFUL OSCAR MOVING VERY NEAR THE TURKS AND CAICOS  ISLANDS...
summary:
...COMPACT BUT POWERFUL OSCAR MOVING VERY NEAR THE TURKS AND CAICOS  ISLANDS...
 As of 8:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 19
 the center of Oscar was located near 21.3, -71.6
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 987 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
